Thu Dec 28 02:56:20 PM UTC 2023
ğŸš export PKG_CONFIG_PATH=/opt/lib/pkgconfig:/usr/lib/pkgconfig
ğŸš export CFLAGS=-I/opt/include 
ğŸš export LDFLAGS=-L/opt/lib 
ğŸš mktemp -d
ğŸš cd
ğŸš curl -fsSLO https://www.gnupg.org/ftp/gcrypt/libgpg-error/libgpg-error-1.47.tar.bz2
ğŸš echo 9e3c670966b96ecc746c28c2c419541e3bcb787d1a73930f5e5f5e1bcbbb9bdb  libgpg-error-1.47.tar.bz2
ğŸš tee SHA256SUM
ğŸš cat SHA256SUM
ğŸš shasum -c SHA256SUM
ğŸš rm SHA256SUM
ğŸš tar -xf libgpg-error-1.47.tar.bz2
ğŸš cd libgpg-error-1.47
ğŸš ./configure --prefix=/opt/package/libgpg-error-1.47
ğŸš make -j8
ğŸš sudo make install
ğŸš rm -rf
